title: SENRAN KAGURA Peach Ball + 4 DLCs
body:
SENRAN KAGURA Peach Ball + 4 DLCs


Genres/Tags: Arcade, Pinball, 3D
Companies: Honey Parade Games, Marvelous USA
Languages: ENG/MULTI6
Original Size: 3.6 GB
Repack Size: from 1.7 GB [Selective Download]

 
 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x | [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • Tapochek.net
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehosters: Google Drive + 2 (Uploaded by Uria Urikra and hermietkreeft, compatible with torrent)
  • Filehoster: WorldSrc (NOT compatible with other mirrors)

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on SENRAN_KAGURA_Peach_Ball-HOODLUM ISO release: hlm-senr.iso (3,861,495,808 bytes)
  • 4 DLCs are included and activated
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective Download feature: you can skip downloading and installing of Chinese and Korean localizations; English, French and Japanese are included by default
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 3.6 to 1.7~2.1 GB, depending on selected components)
  • Installation takes 2-4 minutes
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: up to 7 GB
  • Language can be changed in game settings
  • Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

When amateur chemist Haruka spills a mysterious concoction in the arcade where she works, five of her shinobi friends start acting a little wild. They think they’re animals, and the only way to cure them is with Haruka’s mystical Peach Ball. The best way to do that? Pinball, of course! Haruka will get the girls onto the tables, but she needs you to work some magic with the flippers and apply the antidote.

Ninja battles, rhythmic cooking contests, water gun fights, massage therapy — what new horizons hasn’t the SENRAN KAGURA series conquered yet? Oh, right: pinball! Use the flippers to bounce the magical Peach Ball all around one of multiple dynamic tables, with a beloved shinobi girl in the middle of it all. Bounce the ball off her knees, feet, or hands to make her shift position and raise the stakes!

Included DLCs

  • SENRAN KAGURA DC Stage BGM
  • SENRAN KAGURA EV Stage BGM
  • SENRAN KAGURA PBS Stage BGM
  • SENRAN KAGURA SV Stage BGM
